installCommand: rm -f /vercel/path0/node_modules/.bin/node || true && ( [ -f myphoenixphone/package.json ] && cd myphoenixphone || true ) && npm install --include=dev && npm --prefix myphoenixphone --workspace apps/backend exec prisma generate --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
buildCommand: npm --prefix myphoenixphone run -w apps/backend build && npm --prefix myphoenixphone run -w apps/web build
